staticInfo.description: Sheet information not modifiable in Kobold.

usesStamina.description: Whether the creature follows alternate stamina rules.

infoLists.description: Sheet information as arrays of strings.

amount.description: the amount of weakness/resistance for this type of damage
the amount of weakness/resistance for this type of damage

stats.description: All stats, each potentially having a roll, a dc, a proficiency, and an ability.

baseCounters.description: The non-configurable base counters for a sheet.

counterGroups.description: The configurable counters for a sheet that aren't in a group.

countersOutsideGroups.description: The configurable counter groups for a sheet.

effects.description: Any abilities or rider effects to an attack

sourceData.description: The source data the sheet was parsed from

items.description: A modifier is a bonus or penalty that can be applied to rolls or sheet properties.
